question:
You are looking for a part-time job. Write a letter to an employment agency.
In your letter:

     - introduce yourself
     - explain what sort of job you would like
     - say what experience and skills you have
text: I am writing this letter with reference to the advertisement for your employment agency in The Hindu newspaper.

My name is Farhana Jabeen and currently pursuing my master’s degree in Hospital and clinical pharmacy. I am currently seeking a part-time job in the same field ,particularly as an assistant research scientist. However, there are only a few companies that offer this role, I would really want that job as I am planning on becoming a lead research scientist myself.

In order to achieve my goal, I have taken several courses with respect to research and has been certified as well. Although  I do not have hands-on experience as a professional, I was assisting my professor during the course of his project work. In addition to this, I acquired skills such as Ms Office and good communication.
I would really appreciate it if you could provide me with the details of any available vacancies at the earliest.
